titles.title: To extend temporarily the duty suspension on 4,4'-Oxydiphthalic anhydride (ODPA).
To extend temporarily the duty suspension on 4,4'-Oxydiphthalic anhydride (ODPA).

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend temporarily the duty suspension on 4,4'-Oxydiphthalic anhydride (ODPA).
